page.title: 01CHELTENHAM LANDSCAPE
page.content: This area of CHELTENHAM includes most of the features of a developing Regency{Spa}Town. The linear development of the High Street is clearly visible and now contains many well-known stores. Of particular note is the recently constructed Regent Arcade which adjoins the Everyman Theatre and is linked to the Promenade,a beautiful tree-lined avenue,originally built as an elegant residential parade,now affording exclusive{shopping.}Typical of Cheltenham's{leisure}areas is the Imperial Gardens overlooked by the Town Hall and Queen's Hotel. Nearby is the exclusive Montpellier area with its famous caryatids. Close by is the Cheltenham Ladies College, one of the town's several higher{educational} establishments.
